posts.post_title: sold: seven t206's rough shape.  OM, PB, SC, Pdmt
posts.post_content:
SOLD, paypal only.  Notice the scan shows an Orth and a Seymour,  but they are not included in the lot.

Here are the seven cards included in the lot:

Merritt PB
Schmidt (Portrait)
Marshall

Hofman
Covaleski
